information_description: Here you’ll find everything you need to know about stands and equipment.
order_screen_a: If your company needs screens for your stand, you can order them from
address_a: Equipment can be sent to: Realfagbygget, Høgskoleringen 5, 7034 TRONDHEIM. Use the main entrance. Contact the rig manager and they can help receive items upon arrival.
stand_a: Kjemidagen provides one table, two chairs, and a power outlet.
job_positions_a: If your company would like to post a job listing for a summer internship or graduate position, please contact
